site.name: Eat Is Family
site.tagline: Celebrate Food, Every Friday and Beyond
site.description: Your destination for culinary experiences, food events, and gastronomic adventures.

hero.title: We Are Eat Is Family
hero.subtitle: Where Every Day Feels Like Friday
hero.description: We Are Eat Is Family! We create food experiences where people gather, celebrate, and connect. From kitchen operations to service delivery, our teams bring passion, precision, and genuine hospitality to every venue we support.

intro.title: Your attention to detail? Entrust it to us, that's our added value!
intro.description: As an event caterer, we offer a personalized, homemade, seasonal and balanced catering service for your technical teams, the general public and the guests at your reception.
intro.tagline: Opt for stress free restaurant management, and your fingers will tell you: "Mmm, that's delicious..."

features.title: Culinary Workshops
features.description: Learn from expert chefs and master new cooking techniques in our hands-on workshops.

features.title: Food Events
features.description: Join us for exciting food festivals, tastings, and culinary celebrations throughout the year.

features.title: Career Opportunities
features.description: Build your career in the food industry with our exciting job openings and internships.

features.title: Food Blog
features.description: Explore recipes, tips, and stories from the world of gastronomy on our blog.

hero.title: Bursting With Flavour. Built With Passion.
hero.subtitle: We are Eat Is Family
hero.description: We bring handcrafted food, bold flavour and reliable operations to stadiums, arenas and the biggest festivals in France. Our work mixes human warmth with professional scale — and our story is worth a look.

intro_section.description: Eat Is family runs a streamlined, scalable operational structure designed to support events, venues, and high-volume food experiences.
intro_section.tagline: We combine efficiency, creativity, and bold execution to deliver consistent quality across every location.

map_section.title: Explore Where We Operate
map_section.description: Tap any marker on the map to discover the story behind that event. Each marker clicked unlocks a snapshot of the venue, the experience we delivered, and the flavours we brought to life.

timeline.title:
Our Journey Through Time: From one
food truck to tens of venues
timeline.subtitle: Drag playhead or click markers to explore

events.title: First Meal
events.event: What started as a single food truck with a bold vision has grown into France leading event catering company. We began with simple, honest food and a commitment to quality that still drives us today.

events.title: Expanding Horizons
events.event: With a growing reputation for excellence, we expanded our operations to include multiple food trucks and pop-up kitchens at major events across France.

events.title: Culinary Excellence
events.event: We partnered with renowned chefs to elevate our menu offerings, introducing gourmet options that delighted our customers and set us apart in the industry.

events.title: Nationwide Presence
events.event: Our commitment to quality and service led to partnerships with major venues and festivals nationwide, solidifying our position as a leader in event catering.

events.title: Sustainability Initiatives
events.event: We launched several sustainability initiatives, focusing on reducing waste, sourcing local ingredients, and promoting eco-friendly practices throughout our operations.

events.title: Looking Ahead
events.event: As we look to the future, we remain dedicated to innovation, quality, and community. Our journey continues as we explore new culinary horizons and create unforgettable food experiences.

mission.title:
Where Food Becomes Art and Moments
Become Magic

encadres.title: what we do and our promise to you
encadres.desc:
We cater events of all sizes with a balance of professional service and artistic presentation. From intimate dinners to big celebrations, our dishes are carefully prepared, beautifully plated.

Whether it's a wedding, corporate event, birthday, or private dining, we deliver catering that feels fresh, exciting, and full of character. We don't just serve food — we bring the experience.

At Eat Is Family, food isn't just served. It's celebrated. It's shared. It's remembered.

encadres.title: Our Philosophy and why we're different
encadres.desc:
Good food. Good people. Good vibes. We show up with passion, precision, and personality. Every meal tells a story. Every plate gets treated like a canvas. Every client becomes part of our family.

We are different because we blend traditional flavours with modern, bold presentations, we focus on family style warmth with high quality service and we make your event feel alive, vibrant, and unforgettable

consulting.title: Consulting services Rooted in Real World Expertise
consulting.description:
We don't just cook — we help teams build systems that work.

Our consulting service supports restaurants, event venues, and food businesses looking to optimise workflows, scale operations, improve quality or launch new concepts.

Our approach is grounded in real field expertise: the way teams communicate, how meals are prepared at scale, and how service truly runs when the pressure is high.
services: Cost control, quality control process optimisation

vision.title:
The Brains Behind Eat
is family
vision.content: Founded by Adrien Clerc and Jimmy Herbaux, two restaurateurs and event caterers convinced that a comprehensive food service would greatly facilitate the organization of events.

trusted_by.title: They trusted us for their restoration by the general public, they did not regret their choices:

hero.title: Insightful Stories From The Kitchen

articles.title: The Future of Stadium Catering: 5 Trends Reshaping the Industry
articles.excerpt: The stadium food experience has evolved dramatically over the past decade. Gone are the days when a basic hot dog and warm beer were the only options. Today's fans expect quality, variety, and convenience — and technology is making it all possible.
